rock.title: Rock Paper Scissors
rock.description: A simple responsive solution to the Frontend mentor challenge, Rock Paper Scissors web game against PC

techworks.title: Techworks platform
techworks.description: A platform to manage Techworks boot-camp attendance, schedules, and scoring system. It also has a feature to send bulk emails

clinic.description: A dashboard to manage patients records for doctors, pharmacists, and accountants
